dmca.title: Danish Citizen complains to Google of .UK and .DK defamation
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs		 
Re: [#17770181] Google Removal Request

We refer to our correspondence by e-mail dated 11 March 2005 in connection to three web pages which are showing when our clients' names are searched through google.co.uk and google.dk, namely:

[redacted]

We now enclose a Statement signed by [private] dated 22 March 2005 in the required format.

Please would you ensure that the pages are blocked and/or removed from both google.co.uk and google.dk immediately in order to avoid any further damage to our clients and, more particularly, their reputations.

Please do not hesitate to contact our [private] by e-mail at [private]@salans.corn should you have any queries.

We look forward to hearing from you as a matter of urgency. Yours faithfully,

SALANS
[redacted]
